## BitMatrix.setAt() method

Enables or disables bit at `m,n` (row major). Returns a non-zero value if the bit was previously enabled. No bounds checking. .

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setAt(m: number, n: number, v?: boolean): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  m | <code>number</code> | row |
|  n | <code>number</code> | column |
|  v | <code>boolean</code> | bit value |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`
